text: Sanika uMûsâ iNcwadi, Saza Samlandelisa ngothotho lwabaProfeti, kananjalo Sanika u’Isâ27 unyana kaMaryam28 imiqondiso ecacileyo, samxhasa ngoMoya oyiNgcwele29. Ingaba nakusoloko qho xa kufike uMprofeti kuni ephethe oko nina ningakuthandiyo niba nenkukhumalo? Abanye nala ukukholwa kubo bambi nababulala
